PLplot Resources

 
 
Documentation

PLplot documentation in DocBook form
The fairly comprehensive but dated documentation has been converted to DocBook form, and there is an active project to update it to be consistent with PLplot 5.0

Mailing Lists
Access PLplot mailing lists
From here you can subscribe or view the archives.

Wiki
View the PLplot wiki
The wiki provides instructions on how to build PLplot on your system.

Tarballs and rpm's
Access PLplot tarballs and rpm's
From this SourceForge file release area for PLplot you may download tarballs and rpm's and also view the release notes (by clicking on the version number).

Debian Packages

Debian packages for PLplot 5.3.1 are available in the stable distribution of Debian. Packages for PLplot 5.6.1 are available in the testing and the unstable distributions.
